title: How to be part of archaeological research in India or internationally without a degree in archaeology - Quora

response.answer_text: Volunteer Abroad Programs & Reviews | GoAbroad.com-abroad/search/archaeology/ Volunteer Abroad | Intern Abroad | Projects Abroad Asia is included and not having a degree certainty will not hamper you. Some sensible advice if you’ve never been on a dig before you will get some training. But ALWAYS remember not to just dig something up because you’ve spotted something. ALWAYS obtain advice from a senior site member of the team and not just another teammate. ENJOY
